# vabl

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This repo implements the record linkage techniques proposed in Variational Beta Linkage (citation TBD). 

## Installation

You can install the development version of vabl like so:

```{r}
devtools::install_github("briankundinger/vabl")
```

Add vignette?
